Class Player

java.lang.Object
player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer, ServerPlayer

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, Mark mark)
      creates a new player object with a name and a mark.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of player.
      mark - is the mark the player is going to use (Black or White).

      public String getName()
      Return the name of a player.
      Returns:

      public Mark getMark()
      Returns the mark of a player.
      Returns:

    • determineMove

      public abstract int determineMove(Board board)
      lets an object that extends Player, determine a move for the next play
      Parameters:
      board - is the current board.
      Returns:
      the index of the determined move.

    • determineRotation

      public abstract int determineRotation(Board board)
      lets an object that extends Player, determine a rotation for the next play.
      Parameters:
      board - is the current board.
      Returns:
      a value that contains the quadrant that has to be rotated and the direction.

    • makeMove

      public boolean makeMove(Board board)
      It first calls the method determineMove, and according to that choice, places a marble of this player's color on that spot.
      Parameters:
      board - the board where the player has to make a move on.
      Returns:
      true if the player wants to leave the game

    • makeRotation

      public boolean makeRotation(Board board)
      makes a move on a provided board according to the determinedRotation method
      Parameters:
      board - the current board
